text: Kawom musyrikin lom jikheun meunoe Bandum buet kamoe cit kheundak Allah Meunyoe Neukheundak laen le Tuhan Han roe peue laen nyang kamoe seumah Ã€ Meunan pih dilee dum ayah kamoe Bandum na kamoe meuseumah Allah Han Neupeuhareuem pih barangkapeue Meu kon kheundak nyoe ka nibak Allah Lagee nyan cit buet awak nyang dilee Jipeugah lagee macam jiilah Teuma di Rasul kon na peue laen Geupeutroh mantong beu trang geupeugah
